tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE user_feedback (  user_id INT,  feedback TEXT,  rating INT,  timestamp TIMESTAMP );
CREATE TABLE game_features (  feature_id INT,  feature_name TEXT,  description TEXT,  impact_score DECIMAL );

CREATE TABLE Review (
   review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   user_id INT,
   feature_id INT,
   review_text TEXT,
   rating INT,
   FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES UserFeedback(user_id),
   FOREIGN KEY (feature_id) REFERENCES GameFeatures(feature_id)
);

CREATE TABLE game_reviews (
  review_id INT,
  game_id INT,
  user_id INT,
  review_text TEXT,
  rating INT
);

CREATE TABLE Review (
    review_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID,
    game_id UUID,
    review_text TEXT,
    rating INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE UserRating (
    user_id UUID,
    game_id UUID,
    rating INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    PRIMARY KEY (user_id, game_id)
);
